授業方法:
Spring Intensive English is a twice-a-week course designed to acclimate advanced proficiency first-year students to standard university English course expectations. Students will actively use English as a tool to complete various types of tasks. This will allow students to improve their English skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking), as well as other skills, such as organizing ideas, group work, public speaking etc.

For students who have permission to take this course online, the online course will be held in the following formats:
- simultaneous two-way online broadcast of face-to-face classes
- (if necessary) on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes
